mapper.select: select * from board order by board_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select * from board order by board_viewcnt desc limit 0, 10
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_regdate) values(#{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, now())
mapper.update: update board set board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_updatedate=now() where board_bno=#{board_bno}
update board set board_viewcnt=board_viewcnt+1 where board_bno=#{board_bno}
update board set board_replycnt=board_replycnt+#{amount} where board_bno=#{board_bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_reply where board_reply_bno=#{board_reply_bno}
